鍖鍖鍖

鍖字的基本解释

鍖
chěn
〔鍖然〕虚心的样子，如“鍖鍖不满，退托于族。”
〔鍖銋（
r噉 ）〕（声音）舒缓，如“行鍖鍖以和啰。”

鍖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chěn］
［《廣韻》丑甚切，上寢，徹。］
(1)见“鍖銋”。
(2)通“欿”。不自满。参见“鍖然”。
[②]［zhēn］
［《集韻》知林切，平侵，知。］
(1)砧板。
(2)斫，斩。

鍖字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鍖； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1314第04
【廣韻】【集韻】?丑甚切，音碪。【玉篇】鍖銋。【王褒·洞簫賦】行鍖銋而龢囉。【註】鍖，丑錦反。鍖銋，聲不進貌。　又【集韻】知林切，音碪。本作枮。斫木櫍也。【前漢·項籍傳身伏斧質註】質謂鍖也。

鍖字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鍖字的起名意思

暂无。

鍖
Basic explanation of words
鍖
chěn
〔鍖然〕An humbly appearance, such as "He is dissatisfied and retreats to the clan."
〔鍖銋(
r 啖)] (sound) soothing, such as "walking 鍖鍖 to harmony."
鍖
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chěn]
["Guangyun" is ugly and cut, go to bed, and thoroughly. ]
(1) See "鍖銋".
(2) Through "欿". Not complacent. See "Chen Ran".
[②]［zhēn］
["Ji Yun" knows Lin Qi, Ping invades, knows. ]
(1) Cutting board.
(2) Tuck, chop.
鍖
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鍖; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1314 04
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ugly cut, sound chrysanthemum. [Jade articles] 鍖銋. 【Wang Bao·Dongxiao Fu】Going smoothly and harmoniously. [Note] 鍖, the ugly brocade is against.鍖銋, the sound is silent.　[Jiyun] Knowing Lin Qie, the sound of the ring. This is a shame. Shu Mu Shu also. [Previous Han·Xiang Ji passed down the body with axe quality note] The quality is the same.
鍖
